message: Starting impact assessment of ${workspaceFolder} expansion issue. Will analyze task locations, functionality status, and migration needs.
JSONL logging confirmed working in wrong location. Testing get_agent_output functionality to assess if feature is broken.
Functionality verified working. Now assessing registry split and migration strategy options.

Impact assessment complete. Deliverable: impact_assessment.md with task counts (58 proper, 5 wrong), functionality status (all working, no breakage), migration strategy (MOVE recommended), backward compatibility plan, and user communication. Evidence: verified JSONL logs working, tested get_agent_output, examined both registries, counted all tasks.
